content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal mining setup at position (30.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill at (30.0, 0.0) (fuel=26 coal)
- Wooden chest at (30.5, 1.5) (contains 125 coal)
- Operational with 42 coal/min production

#### Coal mining setup at position (30.0, 20.0)
- Burner mining drill at (30.0, 20.0) (fuel=25 coal)
- Wooden chest at (30.5, 21.5) (contains 63 coal)
- Operational with stable output

#### Iron smelting line at position (40.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at (40.0, 0.0) (rebuilt)
- Burner inserter at (39.5, 0.5) (fuel=9 coal, output blocked)
- Wooden chest at (38.5, 0.5) (contains 5 iron ore)
- Missing output chest causing blockage

#### Copper smelting line at position (40.0, 5.0)
- Stone furnace present but inactive
- Burner inserter at (39.5, 5.5) (fuel=9 coal, output blocked)
- Wooden chest at (38.5, 5.5) (empty)
- Incomplete setup

#### Coal distribution hub at position (18.5, -0.5)
- Wooden chest at (18.5, -0.5) (10 coal)
- Burner inserter at (18.5, 0.5) (fuel=19 coal)
- Burner inserter at (18.5, 1.5) (fuel=9 coal)
- Wooden chest at (18.5, 2.5) (empty)
- Functional but underutilized

### ERROR TIPS

#### Smelting system configuration
- Repeated furnace disappearance at (40.0, 0.0)
- Inserter placement failures due to distance (39 tiles)
- Output chest missing causing blockages
- Solutions:
  - Implement entity tracking system
  - Maintain minimum 10 tile placement buffer
  - Pre-place all chests before inserters

#### Resource management
- Failed ore patch detection at (50.0, 0.0) and (50.0, 10.0)
- Wooden chest shortages halting progress
- Solutions:
  - Implement resource scouting protocol
  - Maintain minimum stock of 5 wooden chests
  - Create dedicated wood harvesting system

#### Entity tracking
- Lost furnace tracking at (40.0, 0.0)
- Missing inserter at (39.5, 0.5)
- Solutions:
  - Implement coordinate-based entity registry
  - Create placement verification routine
  - Use blueprint system for critical layouts

#### Production chain gaps
- Missing iron plates for gear production
- Incomplete copper smelting line
- Solutions:
  - Prioritize iron plate production
  - Complete copper smelting setup
  - Implement material buffer system

#### Maintenance protocols
Current successful systems:
- Fuel tracking (drills: 26/25 coal)
- Production monitoring (42 coal/min)
Recommended upgrades:
- Automated refueling alerts
- Output blockage detection
- Predictive maintenance system
